title: Revenge & Love
description: In the final installment of Harley’s story, her journey comes to a heart-stopping conclusion with more spilled blood and shocking revelations. Colt will stop at nothing in seeking revenge against those responsible for sending Harley to prison, even if it means putting his own life on the line. Will they still get the happily ever after they deserve, or will Colt’s actions and the fate of the MC drive them apart forever?
author: J.A. Fredericks
